short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modifies Odoo to allow for phone/mail order payments on behalf of customers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool enhances the "Generate a Payment Link" feature in Odoo by automatically opening payment links in an incognito window, streamlining the process for agents to securely pay invoices or orders on behalf of customers. Say goodbye to the hassle of manually switching to incognito mode. Perfect for businesses looking to improve efficiency and customer satisfaction in phone or mail order scenarios!

This chrome extension is not affiliated or endorsed by Odoo SA.
